intro: Rondeletia brenesii, commonly known as the purple flame vine, is a flowering plant native to Central America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and climbers. The plant is characterized by its vibrant orange to red tubular flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are opposite, simple, and often have a glossy appearance. Rondeletia brenesii is typically grown as a ornamental plant due to its striking floral display.
